📊 Distribution Insights

Daily revenue shows consistent distribution with few outliers
Monthly revenue has wider spread indicating seasonal variation
Median values are slightly below mean, suggesting right skew
Outliers indicate special events or promotional periods

Insight

Saturday 2-4 PM shows highest intensity. Consider weekend promotions.

🔍 Pattern Analysis

Morning Rush: 10-11 AM shows consistent activity across weekdays
Afternoon Peak: 2-4 PM captures majority of daily volume
Weekend Pattern: Saturday shows 35% higher activity than weekdays
Evening Decline: Activity drops significantly after 6 PM

Peak Period Detected

Saturday 2-4 PM shows consistent 28% higher transaction volume. Consider targeted promotions during this window.

Seasonal Trend

Summer increase in beverage sales (+12.8%). Stock optimization recommended for Q2-Q3.

Regional Opportunity

Metro Manila and Cebu drive 65% of volume. Expansion potential in Davao and Iloilo regions.
